channel.title: Item stacking
channel.description:
hey guys.
so i added a lime whip to my server, and basically when i spawn 2 they stacked, and its the same when i wield it, it still stacks. ive looked all over the internet to fix this and i couldnt find anything. maybe someone here could possible help me?
thanks

        itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 5409;

        itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280;
        itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
        itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
        itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;
        itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
        itemDef.name = "Lime Whip";
        itemDef.description = "A Lime Abyssal Whip".getBytes();

        itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528; [/code]

item.title: Item stacking
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:522355”]Item.java:
Search for

public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[Config.ITEM_LIMIT];

Under:

		try {
			FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("./Data/data/stackable.dat"));
			while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
				if (c == 0) {

Add:

itemStackable[YOURID] = false; [/quote]

it works, thank you so so much.
Theres still 1 problem though, next to the whip is a 1 :\

Read full topic

			while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
				if (c == 0) {

itemStackable[YOURID] = false;
